title: We're Kind of Fair... Sometimes
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In the Crease! Linda and Emily dive right into the latest NHL news of postponing games due to COVID-19 and what this means for the league. After that they get into why Linda now feels silly about Seattle, how Leon Draisaitl deserves more recognition, and St. Louis Blues Defensemen Colton Parayko joins the show to share his story about a special that led to the start of his new foundation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
